mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_METRIX A WHERE 1=1 AND SYS_ID = #{SYS_ID} AND UI_ID LIKE '%' || #{UI_ID} || '%' AND UI_NM LIKE '%' || #{UI_NM} || '%' AND BASIC_URL LIKE '%' || #{BASIC_URL} || '%'
AND ( FUNCTION_ID_1 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_2 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_3 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_4 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_5 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_6 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_7 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_8 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_9 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' OR FUNCTION_ID_10 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_ID} || '%' )
AND ( FUNCTION_NAME_1 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_2 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_3 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_4 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_5 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_6 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_7 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_8 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_9 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_10 LIKE '%' || #{FUNCTION_NAME} || '%' )
AND CALL_TBL = #{CALL_TBL} ) P

SELECT A.SEQ /* 시퀀스 */ , A.SYS_ID /* 시스템ID */ , A.UI_ID /* 화면ID */ , A.UI_NM /* 화면명 */ , A.BASIC_URL /* 기준URL */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_1 /* 기능ID_1 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_1 /* 기능명_1 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_1 /* 클래스종류1(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_2 /* 기능ID_2 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_2 /* 기능명_2 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_2 /* 클래스종류2(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_3 /* 기능ID_3 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_3 /* 기능명_3 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_3 /* 클래스종류3(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_4 /* 기능ID_4 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_4 /* 기능명_4 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_4 /* 클래스종류4(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_5 /* 기능ID_5 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_5 /* 기능명_5 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_5 /* 클래스종류5(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_6 /* 기능ID_6 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_6 /* 기능명_6 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_6 /* 클래스종류6(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_7 /* 기능ID_7 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_7 /* 기능명_7 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_7 /* 클래스종류7(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_8 /* 기능ID_8 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_8 /* 기능명_8 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_8 /* 클래스종류8(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_9 /* 기능ID_9 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_9 /* 기능명_9 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_9 /* 클래스종류9(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.FUNCTION_ID_10 /* 기능ID_10 */ , A.FUNCTION_NAME_10 /* 기능명_10 */ , A.CLASS_KIND_10 /* 클래스종류10(CT:컨트롤러/SV:서비스/DA:DAO/OT:나머지) */ , A.CALL_TBL /* 호출테이블 */ , A.WORKER_ID /* 입력자ID */ FROM TB_METRIX A WHERE 1=1 AND SYS_ID = #{SYS_ID} AND UI_ID LIKE '%' || #{UI_ID} || '%' AND UI_NM LIKE '%' || #{UI_NM} || '%' AND BASIC_URL LIKE '%' || #{BASIC_URL} || '%'
AND ( FUNCTION_ID_1 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_2 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_3 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_4 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_5 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_6 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_7 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_8 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_9 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' OR FUNCTION_ID_10 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_ID}%' )
AND ( FUNCTION_NAME_1 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_2 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_3 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_4 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_5 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_6 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_7 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_8 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_9 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' OR FUNCTION_NAME_10 LIKE '%${FUNCTION_NAME}%' )
AND CALL_TBL = #{CALL_TBL} LIMIT #{LIMIT}
